thread.title: Rating Agency Developments

author: Orrick - Structured Finance Group
title: Rating Agency Developments
text:
<iframe src="http://www.jdsupra.com/post/contentViewerEmbed.aspx?fid=260e9626-b457-47c7-b223-9173e2bc90e3"   scrolling="auto"> 
published the methodologies it will use to rate and monitor U.S. Property Assessed Clean Energy securitization . Methodology . 
On September 22, ’s published its updated rating methodology for consumer loan-backed ABS . Release . 
On September 21, published an updated legal criteria for European structured finance transactions . Methodology . 
On September 17, ’s requested comments on its proposal to retire its methodology for monitoring residential mortgage-backed securitizations in Mexico , and to replace it with the monitoring approach in its primary credit rating methodology. Announcement .
